name: iDOS 2
description:
Play original dos games on your iPhone/iPad!

Features:

- Program launcher with batch file
- Support both portrait, and full screen landscape with floating control.
- PC compatible soft keyboard
- Virtual Gamepad & Joystick
- Virtual Mouse (use the display as trackpad)

Notes:
- Require basic knowledge with DOS command line
- Please don't enter "exit" command
- Open source: https://github.com/litchie/dospad
